name: chrome-screenshot-extension
description: Capture screenshots of the current page

scripts.build-v2: tsc && cp src/*.html dist/ && cp src/manifest_v2.json dist/manifest.json && cp src/*.png dist/
scripts.build: tsc && cp src/*.html dist/ && cp src/manifest_v3.json dist/manifest.json && cp src/*.png dist/

author: Biel Simon
